Changelog
=========


1.1.0 (2014-09-15)
------------------

- Code cleanup.
  [mathias.leimgruber]

- Implement optional dependency on ftw.journal, which allows you to add
  a journal entry if someone sends a donwload token.
  [tschanzt]


1.0.0 (2014-02-07)
------------------

- Fork and refactor package from ftw.securefiledownload.
  [mathias.leimgruber]
